attributes.action: Investigate the role of the speaker of the house of commons.
attributes.additional_details: The speaker has been seen to be administering his own judgements on the Brexit debate which have seriously impacted on the democratic process in this country.
attributes.background: Judgements have been made by the speaker which call into question his impartiality, especially when dealing with matters relating to Brexit.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
